message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its incredible potential, I'm initially offering it for $1,900,000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,600,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While your offer is tempting, the true value of this product is significant. I'm willing to come down to $1,750,000.  This offer reflects the product's worth and leaves us both in a good position.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,725,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
